name: Police Car Chase Theft 2018
description:
HINTS:

- Complete all police crime missions and get rewards
- Don’t hit any citizen car while police car chase
- Upgrade and customize police cars
- Choose you favorite police car
- Save the citizen lives



How To Play:

- Sit inside the police car to drive
- Fly helicopter to shoot gangsters
- Use tilt/touch to steer your police car
- Use brakes to slow down your police car


Scenes:

- Night
- Rainy
- Sunny
- Snow Falling


Our Mission:

Play our games offline and share with your friends and make huge fun. Don’t forget to give rating, feedback and comment. Send us best suggestions about new gaming ideas, so that in future we may you serve with latest games.


Features:

- HD graphics
- Smooth gameplay control
- 2D & 3D camera views
- Plenty of gangstres
- 3D environment
